name: Jump - offline racing games
description:
● Let it Jump and make a perfect hit on the color twisty road
● Start the game: Great themes, enjoy the game
● Chubby will sing and speed up



● Compatibility and support
We're continuously HARD WORKING so that all phones run the game smoothly. Please report any issue you may experience on our facebook page

● Disclaimer
Jump - offline games with free racing games is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep it away from your kids, children and younger boys and girls
